selectedVerses.text: One of its heads seemed to have a mortal wound, but its mortal wound was healed, and the whole earth marveled as they followed the beast.
As with a deadly wound in my bones, my adversaries taunt me, while they say to me continually, "Where is your God?"
burn for burn, wound for wound, stripe for stripe.
For her wound is incurable, and it has come to Judah; it has reached to the gate of my people, to Jerusalem.
It exercises all the authority of the first beast in its presence, and makes the earth and its inhabitants worship the first beast, whose mortal wound was healed.
